name: Delta Force: Hawk Ops
summary:
Delta Force: Hawk Ops is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical first-person shooter reboot of the Delta Force series.

Development prioritized an overarching storyline with realistic themes, employed real-life actors for character building, utilized photogrammetry for 3D world creation, captured tactical movements from military professionals, and sought guidance from former Special Forces personnel to ensure an authentic tone of resolute realism and professionalism within the military theme.

The campaign mode is based on the movie Black Hawk Down, allowing players to experience the “authentic and thrilling battles” from the movie. The large-scale player-versus-player multiplayer action of the original 1998 game will also return.
